p: To our knowledge, there are no reports on the antimicrobial and antioxidant activities of SEO. This study aimed to evaluate the chemical composition and antimicrobial and antioxidant activities of SEO to determine the potential application of the sunflower receptacle in food and medical fields. The development and utilization of the sunflower receptacle can benefit from scientific guidance provided through the study of the chemical composition and biological activity of SEO.
